introduction: I am a bot, Developed by https://t.me/dopodix . I help you in keep tracking your cigarette/NoFap consumptions and show you statistics and visualization regarding your track. Thank you!
invalid_command: Invalid Command, Please enter correct command.
help:
`/start`: About Bot, Commands
`/help`: Shows Commands
`/setup`: Bot Setup
`/stat`: Sends you Visualization
`/get`: Sends you data
`/stop`: Clear your Bot Setup
`/load`: Load data send by user
`/set`: Update a value in data, format-'2023-03-27 0'
non_user_introduction: I am a bot, Developed by https://t.me/dopodix . I help you in keep tracking your cigarette/NoFap consumptions and show you statistics and visualization regarding your track. Thank you! Right now I am in testing.
